name: 迷雾 The Mist
detailed_description:
Overview

  • "The Mist" is a text association decryption game. The game has 8 chapters, 40+ puzzles, which can be decrypted by associating with the text prompts of each level and combining with the current scene.
  • The game tells the story of my last year, but I won't tell you details.
    It was not easy.
  • Go ahead and experience it yourself.

Instruction

  • The game has 8 chapters: Outset, Frustration, Confusion, Go Astray, Failure, Pressure, Desperation, Hope.
  • Each chapter has 5-6 levels.
  • A sentence will appear at each level. Players need to find the right way to pass the level through association, reasoning and judgment.

Tips

  • Make sure to turn on the volume.
  • Be patient.
  • Challenge yourself.
